catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 222
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: unsigned; musicians and actors on stage at L with audience outdoors, looking on and talking to one another; fence and banners erected behind audience; building at R with men standing and talking behind walls, and others outside sitting and chatting
medium: Ink, color, and gold on gilded paper
title: Okuni Kabuki
